resources.string: You Are Invited to join an amazing experience
Shop here and earn cashback on top of any offer you can get.

Who dont like saving extra when we shop. Here we invite you to this unique app. 

 Simple to use. Shop from here and whatever is the price, assured cashback on every purchase.
 Cashback would reflect in user account after shipping of the item. Also, they can directly redeem it once they reach a threshold of INR 1000. 

 Coming Soon once this app reaches at least 100 users other features such as >

 Additionally, if your friend install this app with your invite code, you would get 5 percent of her earning once she starts purchasing. And there is no limit, 5 percent from every user cashback.

 Every 3 months, the person with maximum cashback would be awarded special prize. See you at the leaderboard.(Leaderboard would show actual redeemable points).Update user profile for being eligible for this program. 

 We wont share your data with anyone but need to process the cashback process.
Get Cashback on every purchase of your order. Currently, its amazon and flipkart where users would be send (preference would be for app mode)

Here we present you a unique experience of earning while you shop for yourself or the ones you care about.

 Different ways to earn through this app are 

 Shop more, with every shopping you would get cashback karma points
 Unlike others the value of each karma point would be equivalent
 For 100 points it would be 100 Rs. 
 Later we would expose the dashboard table where cashback offered would be shown

 Person getting maximum cashback would get something from our end too in May beginning or depends on how we scale

 Every referral would fetch you 5 percent of their cashback. That would be extra. Both of you will be having your cashbacks and this one would be extra

 More stronger network you make more karma points hence

 Coming up with some innovative hacks never seen before. Time constraint so going like this now.

string.name: aboutn
string.b: Get shopping and cashback. Additionally surprise for few users. Coming soon with the new features stay tuned
